<dt>Title</dt>
<dd>Solid Snake (Brawl Based)</dd>
<dt>Description</dt>
<dd>I based this skin on Solid Snake from SSBB. The grenades on his back are from how he somehow pops grenades out of nowhere and the thing on his chest is supposed to be a pack of cigarettes. Enjoy my first skin!</dd>
